description:
Streamline your systems management

Scan, collect, and organize your on-prem Windows machines so deployments go exactly where you need them to with PDQ Inventory.
Improvements
- Deploy: Fixed various auto-download bugs and performance issues
- Inventory: Fixed display issue with the tool window when the Multi-Line checkbox is used with High DPI Displays

Bug Fixes
- Inventory: Corrected collection of PowerShell 2.0 enablement status
- Inventory: Fixed deployment errors showing as multiline in Inventory deployments view
- Inventory: Corrected collection row count display when grouped by a column.
- Deploy: Fixed schedules using cached credentials instead of current credentials when running
